name: A Momentous Breakfast in Space
description: A text based choose your own adventure set in the not to distant future.  You are a blue-collar worker aboard a snack food freighter.  You blearily wake up one fine day en route to make a supply drop to an outlying colony.  Little did you know how pivotal your breakfast choice would be.  Crappy cyborgs, halo-pets, ancestor simulators, grey goo, disgruntled AIs, vomit, alien artifacts, criminal negligence, black holes AND true love await you!
